亂.definition: in confusion or disorder; in a confused state of mind; disorder; upheaval; riot; illicit sexual relations; to throw into disorder; to mix up; indiscriminate; random; arbitrary

亂世.definition: the world in chaos; troubled times; (in Buddhism) the mortal world

亂丟.definition: to discard in the wrong place (cigarette butts etc); to leave one's things lying around

亂來.definition: to act recklessly; to mess around

亂倫.definition: to violate moral principles; depravity; (esp.) to commit incest; incest

亂動.definition: to fiddle with; to tamper with; to meddle with; to move randomly; to flail about

亂哄哄.definition: noisy and in disarray; in an uproar

亂彈琴.definition: to talk nonsense; to behave like a fool

亂扔.definition: to throw (sth) without due care; (esp.) to litter

亂抓.definition: to claw wildly; to scratch frantically; to arrest people indiscriminately

亂搞.definition: to make a mess; to mess with; to be wild; to sleep around; to jump into bed

亂搞男女關係.pinyin: luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4
亂搞男女關係.definition: to be promiscuous; to sleep around

亂真.definition: to pass off as genuine; spurious

亂碼.definition: mojibake (nonsense characters displayed when software fails to render text according to its intended character encoding)

亂竄.definition: to flee in disarray; to scatter

亂糟糟.definition: chaotic; topsy turvy; a complete mess

亂紀.definition: to break the rules; to break discipline

亂臣賊子.definition: rebels and traitors (idiom); general term for scoundrel

亂花.definition: to spend recklessly; to waste money

亂花錢.definition: to spend money recklessly; to squander

亂葬崗.definition: unmarked burial mound; untended graveyard; mass grave

亂說.definition: to talk drivel; to make irresponsible remarks

亂跑.definition: to run around all over the place

亂跳.definition: to jump about; (of the heart) to beat wildly

亂麻.definition: lit. tangled skein; in a tremendous muddle; confused
